kpi.name: M1034C7

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR PS REL99 DCH UL PER OPER
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU data transferred in the DCH in the uplink direction during the measurement interval. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals, and when the connection is released or the active set is changed.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR PS REL99 DCH UL PER OPER
